detectors.description:
VK.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK.sol#37-46) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK.sol#39)
	- balances[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK.sol#40)
detectors.markdown:

detectors.description:
VK.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK.sol#49-60) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK.sol#51)
	- balances[from] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK.sol#52)
	- allowed[from][msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK.sol#53)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK.sol#4)
	- VK.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK.sol#23-25)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK.sol#5)
	- VK.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK.sol#29-31)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK.sol#6)
	- VK.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK.sol#33-35)

transferFrom(address,address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- VK.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK.sol#49-60)
	- ERC20.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK.sol#7)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- VK.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK.sol#62-66)
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK.sol#8)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK.sol#9)
	- VK.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK.sol#37-46)
